page.title: 20A SCHOOL DAY AT HEAMOOR.
page.content: At 8.45a.m.I go to the bathroom to wash my face.I get dressed and have my breakfast in the kitchen.I pack my lunch and leave for school.I don't walk far but it seems a long way when it is hot.I arrive at 9a.m.,put my homework in my desk and go to my seat. We have prayers each day except Monday. Sometimes I do S.M.P. Maths so I fetch my book.After break,which is from 10.30a.m.to 10.50a.m.,I do English and reading. Lunch is from 12.00 to1.30p.m.when I sometimes go to recorder club. After lunch we paint or do work on our term's project.Afternoon break is from 2.35p.m.to 2.55p.m. At the end of the day we listen to a short story and stack our chairs. If there is not a club after school I go home, eat tea and go to the swimming club at the indoor pool.
